    • Method Detail

      • acceptRemove

        public boolean acceptRemove(int offset,
                            int length,
                            int caretPos)
        Indicates whether this segment accepts removing the length at the given offset. When pressing the back-space key, the caret position is one after the offset.
        Specified by:
        acceptRemove in class SegmentFilter.Segment
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset from which to remove.
        length - The length to remove.
        caretPos - The current caret position.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates whether this segment will remove one char from the offset.

      • acceptReplace

        public boolean acceptReplace(int offset,
                             int length,
                             java.lang.String str)
        Indicates whether this segment accepts replacing the string at the given relative offset.
        Specified by:
        acceptReplace in class SegmentFilter.Segment
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset within the segment.
        length - The length to replace.
        str - The string to replace.
        Returns:
        A boolean.

      • remove

        public int remove(int offset,
                  int length,
                  int caretPos)
        Remove the length at the relative offset.
        Specified by:
        remove in class SegmentFilter.Segment
        Parameters:
        offset - The relative offset.
        length - The length to remove.
        caretPos - The current caret position.
        Returns:
        The positions to move the caret.

      • replace

        public int replace(int offset,
                   int length,
                   java.lang.String str)
        Effectively replace the string. Returns an integer indicating the number of positions, left or right, to move the caret.
        Specified by:
        replace in class SegmentFilter.Segment
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset within the segment.
        length - The length to replace.
        str - The string to replace.
        Returns:
        The positions to move the caret.
